documentType: prison count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document consists of official Bureau of Prisons count sheets and an inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit and includes a roster showing inmates assigned to 'HOSP' (hospital) and 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (suicide watch or unassigned) statuses. The documents are administrative records from the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing totals by housing unit and specific assignments including hospital and suicide watch/unassigned statuses.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is dated August 10, 2019 - the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at MCC New York.
Inmate roster shows assignments including 'HOSP' (hospital) and 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (suicide watch or unassigned), which are relevant to Epstein's status at time of death.
Total inmate count recorded as 758 at one point and 754 at another, showing routine administrative tracking.
Document is part of official Bureau of Prisons record-keeping procedures for inmate counts and assignments.
No specific inmate names are listed in the visible portions of these administrative forms.
